 Demian Bold

author: arcvi

comments.content: It must be **[Demian Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114059/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Demian%20Bold%20Plain%20-%20Regular&fid=86edbf49ad2b0368cce25deacb5741db&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Mack&wrap=2)** by Jan van Dijk (Letraset, 1984-87) with a modified /k
